pageContent.content: Generates Unique QR code on personalized letter with Handwritten font:

children.content: Any letter content provided by the client. Currently available: Agent Letter, Buyer Letter & Cash Offer Letters.
Includes handwritten Name & Address on #10 envelope.
Sequences letters & envelopes for printing: Just stuff, affix stamp and mail.
Prospects who scan QR code are taken to your landing page configured for your marketing campaign.
No need for prospects to login or to create an account on your website to be indentified.
To View prospects' Name & Address who scanned the QR code.
Get to know the date, time and location of prospect scanning the QR code to view your landing page.
Explore how this works for you in your business.
